SEARCH
Module edu.guilford
Package edu.guilford

Class Human

java.lang.Object
edu.guilford.Creature
edu.guilford.Critter
edu.guilford.Human
public class Human extends Critter
A class that represents a Human object, which is a subclass of the Critter class A Human object can eat plants, plantEaters, and meatEaters, commute, and pollute the air
Version:
4/18/24
Author:
A.Fuad
See Also:
  • Critter

    Human(float size, float rate, float foodNeed, Plant[] plants, PlantEater[] plantEaters, MeatEater[] meatEaters)
    A constructor that initializes a Human object with a size, growth rate, amount of food needed, and arrays of Plant, PlantEater, and MeatEater objects

  • Constructor Details

    • Human

      public Human(float size, float rate, float foodNeed, Plant[] plants, PlantEater[] plantEaters, MeatEater[] meatEaters)
      A constructor that initializes a Human object with a size, growth rate, amount of food needed, and arrays of Plant, PlantEater, and MeatEater objects
      Parameters:
      size - the initial size of the object (in g)
      rate - the initial rate of growth of the object (in g/day)
      foodNeed - the amount of food the object needs each day (in g)
      plants - an array of Plant objects that the human can eat
      plantEaters - an array of PlantEater objects that the human can eat
      meatEaters - an array of MeatEater objects that the human can eat

  • Method Details

    • simulateDay

      public void simulateDay()
      A method that simulates a day in the life of the Human object; it first calls the eat method, then the simulateDay method of the Critter class, and finally the simulateDay method of the Creature class
      Overrides:
      simulateDay in class Critter

    • eatPlant

      public void eatPlant(int randPlant)
      A method that simulates the Human object eating a plant object
      Parameters:
      randPlant - the index of the plant object in the plants array that the Human object will eat

    • eatPlantEater

      public void eatPlantEater(int randPlantEater)
      A method that simulates the Human object eating a plantEater object
      Parameters:
      randPlantEater - the index of the plantEater object in the plantEaters array that the Human object will eat

    • eatMeatEater

      public void eatMeatEater(int randMeatEater)
      A method that simulates the Human object eating a meatEater object
      Parameters:
      randMeatEater - the index of the meatEater object in the meatEaters array that the Human object will eat

    • commute

      public void commute()
      A method that simulates the Human object commuting, which results in both air and water pollution based on the size of the vehicle

    • polluteAir

      public float polluteAir(float amount)
      A method that simulates the Human object polluting the air
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of pollution that the Human object will cause
      Returns:
      the amount of pollution that the Human object caused
